verse 1

soul screaming and crying feel my brain frying

this oxy gettin pricey pour the codeine in the hic
blood red blend in the hic
ive been doing so much wrong even though ma told me to do the right thing

cant explain this feeling
kinda feels like im losing even though im winning

chorus
drain out bad energy drain out bad energy

drain out bad energy drain out bad energy

all mine from the start

and the trauma in my heart

yellow diamonds shiny pearls
im tryna give her the world
im tryna show her the world
she aint no ordinary girl
i know she know i know she know im down and out
life is a ocean demons ive been drownin out
i watch the crowd and crack a smile
i have a job to lead them out
